title: Project-Based Learning Design to Strengthen Medical Education Instructional Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning environments using digital devices (tablets, laptops), with continuous feedback through formative assessment

learning_goals: Learners can explain core competencies of medical education faculty (clinical knowledge, instructional design, assessment, learner motivation)
Learners can concretely apply effective instructional design strategies through project-based learning (PBL) activities
Learners can develop instructional competency plans through peer evaluation and self-reflection
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
